Package chess

Class Chess

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess
public class Chess extends Object
Represents a pawn piece in the game of chess.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vanessa Chin, Sean Maye

  • Method Details

    • hypeCheck

      public static boolean hypeCheck(Piece piece, int dX, int dY, int toMoveX, int toMoveY)
      Checks if a hypothetical move will put a king in check

      Makes a move on the board, if the move will result in the king being put in check, the board state is reverted

      Parameters:
      piece - the piece that is making the hypothetical move
      dX - the x coordinate of the proposed move of the piece
      dy - the y coordinate of the proposed move of the piece
      toMoveX - the current x coordinate of the piece
      toMoveY - the current y coordinate of the piece

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the chess program.

      Handles player input, gameplay loop, and UI.
